ground.name: The Friends Provident St Mary's Stadium

content.text: Match ends, Southampton 1, Chelsea 5.
Second Half ends, Southampton 1, Chelsea 5.
Attempt missed. Jay Rodriguez (Southampton) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right.
Attempt missed. Jos Hooiveld (Southampton) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the left following a set piece situation.
Foul by Marko Marin (Chelsea).
Jack Cork (Southampton) wins a free kick on the right wing.
James Ward-Prowse (Southampton) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Oscar (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by James Ward-Prowse (Southampton).
Attempt saved. David Luiz (Chelsea) header from the centre of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Oscar with a cross.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Jos Hooiveld.
Goal!  Southampton 1, Chelsea 5. Frank Lampard (Chelsea) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom left corner.
Penalty conceded by Steven Davis (Southampton) with a hand ball in the penalty area.
Foul by Gary Cahill (Chelsea).
Maya Yoshida (Southampton) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, Chelsea. Oscar replaces Juan Mata.
Steve De Ridder (Southampton) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Eden Hazard (Chelsea) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Steve De Ridder (Southampton).
Substitution, Southampton. Tadanari Lee replaces Jason Puncheon.
Attempt missed. Steve De Ridder (Southampton) header from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Guly do Prado with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Southampton. Conceded by César Azpilicueta.
Jason Puncheon (Southampton) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Marko Marin (Chelsea).
Attempt saved. Frank Lampard (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Juan Mata.
Substitution, Chelsea. Marko Marin replaces Victor Moses.
Gary Cahill (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Steve De Ridder (Southampton).
Attempt saved. Demba Ba (Chelsea) header from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Victor Moses with a cross.
Corner,  Southampton. Conceded by David Luiz.
Attempt saved. Steven Davis (Southampton) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal.
Attempt saved. Steve De Ridder (Southampton) left footed shot from very close range is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Guly do Prado with a cross.
Foul by Jason Puncheon (Southampton).
Ashley Cole (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Jack Cork (Southampton) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Eden Hazard (Chelsea).
Substitution, Chelsea. Frank Lampard replaces Branislav Ivanovic.
Hand ball by Steve De Ridder (Southampton).
Substitution, Southampton. Jos Hooiveld replaces José Fonte because of an injury.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match José Fonte (Southampton) because of an injury.
Goal!  Southampton 1, Chelsea 4. Demba Ba (Chelsea) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Eden Hazard.
Attempt saved. David Luiz (Chelsea) header from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Juan Mata with a cross.
Foul by Guly do Prado (Southampton).
Eden Hazard (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Ramires (Chelsea).
Luke Shaw (Southampton) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Juan Mata (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Luke Shaw (Southampton).
Substitution, Southampton. Steve De Ridder replaces Morgan Schneiderlin.
Morgan Schneiderlin (Southampton) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Demba Ba (Chelsea).
Goal!  Southampton 1, Chelsea 3. Branislav Ivanovic (Chelsea) header from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Juan Mata with a cross.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Guly do Prado.
Attempt blocked. Juan Mata (Chelsea) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Eden Hazard.
Jay Rodriguez (Southampton) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Gary Cahill (Chelsea).
Second Half begins Southampton 1, Chelsea 2.
First Half ends, Southampton 1, Chelsea 2.
Goal!  Southampton 1, Chelsea 2. Victor Moses (Chelsea) left footed shot from the left side of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Ashley Cole.
Attempt missed. Demba Ba (Chelsea) left footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by César Azpilicueta with a cross.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Jason Puncheon.
Offside, Southampton. Jay Rodriguez tries a through ball, but Jason Puncheon is caught offside.
Foul by Branislav Ivanovic (Chelsea).
Jay Rodriguez (Southampton) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Demba Ba (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Maya Yoshida (Southampton).

Attempt saved. César Azpilicueta (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Eden Hazard.

Goal!  Southampton 1, Chelsea 1. Demba Ba (Chelsea) left footed shot from very close range to the centre of the goal.

Foul by Demba Ba (Chelsea).
Maya Yoshida (Southampton) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Goal!  Southampton 1, Chelsea 0. Jay Rodriguez (Southampton) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Jason Puncheon with a through ball.
